description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice at will, making them a Freezing Human. The user can freeze anything they touch and manipulate ice on a massive scale.

users.circumstances: Aokiji consumed the fruit at an unknown time before becoming a Marine Admiral.

abilityReveals.description: The user places their hand in water and instantly freezes a massive area of ocean along with any creatures within it.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Aokiji uses Ice Age to freeze the ocean to help stranded people cross to safety, also freezing a Sea King in the process.

abilityReveals.description: The user freezes grass, water vapor, or other materials to create a blade-like weapon made of ice.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Aokiji creates an Ice Saber by blowing on grass to freeze it, then attempts to attack Robin with it.

abilityReveals.description: The user freezes their own body while in contact with a target, causing the target to freeze solid as well.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Aokiji uses Ice Time to freeze Luffy's fist, Zoro's arm, and Sanji's leg simultaneously, then later uses it to completely freeze Robin.

abilityReveals.description: As a Logia user, Aokiji can transform into ice, allowing attacks to pass through him harmlessly and then reform.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: When Robin uses Treinta Fleur: Clutch to shatter Aokiji's body, he breaks apart like ice and then reforms completely unharmed.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Ice can be melted by heat or magma-based attacks
As ice is solid, the user cannot dissolve as easily as other Logia types and reformation may be slower

strengths.description: Can freeze entire sections of ocean, effectively neutralizing the Devil Fruit swimming weakness.
Anything that touches the user can be instantly frozen solid.
Physical attacks pass through the user's ice body harmlessly.
Can create various weapons and constructs from ice.
